content: X-CT MX Formwork nails (collated) Collated formwork nail for use with powder-actuated tools for temporary fixing to concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Predefined shear points on the fastener for controlled fastener removal Fast removal – no crowbar needed Remove wood virtually undamaged so it can be reused Collated fasteners for the temporary fastening of wood to concrete Applications Temporary fastening of wood to concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 3-1/8 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 3-1/8 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Outdoor temporary applications, Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.14 in | Point type | Cut point | Approvals | ITB | For use with (tools) | DX 5, DX 6 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 3888106 - KIT X-CT 47 MX+6.8/11 M10T TITANIUM - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Forming fastener X-CT 47 MX - 1000x DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10 T titanium C-T - 413002 - Forming fastener X-CT 47 MX - Package Size 100 pc -
